input_text:
Job Title: Development/Delivery Manager

Location: Addison, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Description 

Roles and Responsibilities

Manage a team of 5-10 Software engineers and business analysts.

Deliver Azure enterprise solutions in a fast phased, dynamic & customer focused Scaled Agile environment.

Foster a culture of delivering with quality, care & speed

Mentor and coach Engineers on development & deployment best practices

Contribute to solution development activities directly

Collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as Scrum Masters, Integration Engineers, QA Analysts, DevOps engineers, IT Ops resources, architects, and business stakeholders to design and implement solutions that meet business requirements.

 Qualifications 

10+ years of hands-on development experience in Microsoft .Net technologies

3-5 years hands on experience in developing and delivering Azure cloud technologies and solutions.

5+ yearsâ€™ experience as a Development/Delivery manager role.

Familiarity with latest technologies and trends in AI/ML and AskGPT landscape.

Proven experience in handling multiple projects and initatives concurrently & successfully

Strong experience with Azure DevOps, Git and other DevOps tools

Familiarity with Azure routing and firewalls.

Strong hands in experience in modernizing and migrating legacy applications to Azure cloud.

Possess a broad base of technical skills, business acumen, and a strong desire to support business needs.

Understand the detail behind the implemented solution and having the ability to communicate the high-level vision with the IT and business leadership.

Effectively communicate solutions architecture to the client, third parties, and the team

Encompass strong listening and interpersonal skills, an ability to solve complex problems, a big picture mentality, and an aptitude to visualize the solution.

Encompass strong listening and interpersonal skills, an ability to solve complex problems, a big picture mentality, and an aptitude to visualize the solution.

Able to foster teamwork among the delivery team(s)

Proficiency in hardware, software and/or operating systems environments

Proven troubleshooting & problem-solving ability.

Presentation and facilitation of executive level meetings, group presentations, and collaborative technical workshops

Experience in the Insurance Industry is definitely a plus.

 Skills 

net, Azure, manager, artificial intelligence, git, DevOps


 Top Skills Details 

net,Azure,manager,artificial intelligence,git,DevOps


 Additional Skills & Qualifications 

We potentially have some flexibility on conversion salary but not on days in office. Possibly up to 170K. Minimum 3 days onsite is required. We also are only looking in Dallas at this time. They HAVE to have had a technical background.

 Experience Level 

Expert Level

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
